attributes.action: Include the house price index in the measure of inflation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We petition the PM to change the government's policy on calculating the measure of inflation to include  changes of all house price sales in the UK. As house prices were increasing at a rate above inflation the risk of toxic assets and the Banks recless lending was hidden by this not being included in the inflation figures, which the Governemnet boasted was well inside the levels needed for sustainable growth.
